author: Adam Beam
title: San Patricio County farmers eligible for $3 million conservation incentives
text: SINTON, Tx â€” The Natural Resources Conservation Service (NRCS) is offering $3 million in incentives to farmers and ranchers in the San Patricio, Refugio and Bee County areas. The conservation initiative has been around for "several years," according to Kyle Wright, a State Water Quality Specialist with NRCS. The initiative is meant to improve the water quality of the watersheds in these areas. However, to encourage more participation in the initiative, they have decided to add a monetary incentive for the property owners. "You're getting paid for something here in some cases you're already doing," Bobby Nedbalek, a farmer in San Patricio County said. "Everybody in agriculture is being as conscious of the environment and conservative." Farms near the following watersheds are eligible: Â· The Aransas River priority area consists of 12 HUC-12 watersheds in Bee, Refugio and San Patricio counties. Â· The Big Elm Creek priority area consists of seven HUC-12 watersheds in Bell, Falls, Milam and McLennan counties. Â· The Lake Lavon priority area consists of nine HUC-12 watersheds in Grayson, Fannin, Collin and Hunt counties. Â· The Lampasas River priority area consists of eight HUC-12 watersheds in Lampasas and Burnet counties. In a press release by the NRCS some of the projects that farmers can open their land to includes, "brush management, conservation cover, crop rotation, fence, prescribed grazing, heavy use area protection, irrigation pipeline, micro-irrigation system, ponds, range planting and many more." Applications for eligible practices that meet or exceed pre-determined minimum ranking thresholds, which is 30 for Texas, will be considered for priority funding when applying for this initiative. The deadline to register for these incentives is August 9, and you can find more information on the NRCS website [here.](https://www.nrcs.usda.gov/conservation-basics/conservation-by-state/texas/news/nrcs-texas-announces-additional-sign-up-period) For the latest local news updates, [click here](https://www.kristv.com/news/local-news), or download the [KRIS 6 News App.](https://www.kristv.com/about-us/kris-6-apps)

author: Redazione
title: Fiat 600 Hybrid e Topolino a Rom-E
text: ROMA (ITALPRESS) â€“ Fiat dallâ€™4 al 6 ottobre partecipa alla quarta edizione di Rom-E, il festival sulla sostenibilitÃ¡ ambientale, sociale e sulla mobilitÃ¡ che per tre giorni ospiterÃ¡ convegni, test drive, attivitÃ¡ educative e confronti tra aziende e istituzioni. Patrocinato dal Ministero dellâ€™Ambiente e della Sicurezza Energetica e da Roma Capitale, lâ€™evento capitolino si pone lâ€™obiettivo di sensibilizzare il pubblico su tematiche cruciali per la salvaguardia del nostro pianeta. Lâ€™esperienza romana inizierÃ¡ venerdÃ­ 4 ottobre con il convegno â€œLa transizione verso una sostenibilitÃ¡ accessibile e realeâ€, che si terrÃ¡ presso la Casa del Cinema, allâ€™interno della splendida Villa Borghese, per poi proseguire il 5 e 6 ottobre con una serie di installazioni dislocate in diverse zone del centro della cittÃ¡. Protagonista della manifestazione la Nuova 600 Hybrid, la versione ibrida del modello che segna il ritorno di Fiat nel segmento B, che sarÃ¡ esposta sullo stand allestito in viale delle Magnolie, sempre presso Villa Borghese, mentre poco distante in Piazza Bucarest sarÃ¡ messo a disposizione Fiat Topolino, il quadriciclo elettrico votato alla mobilitÃ¡ urbana sostenibile e accessibile dai 14 anni, per emozionanti test drive tra le vie della CittÃ¡ Eterna. Inoltre, presso lo stand si svolgeranno numerose attivitÃ¡ pensate per i piÃº giovani, con lâ€™obiettivo di contribuire alla formazione nelle nuove generazioni sulla mobilitÃ¡ a zero o basse emissioni. In questo contesto spiccano le retro-copertine dei quaderni Pigna Monocromo brandizzati Nuova Fiat 600, strumenti originali per scoprire le nuove tecnologie elettriche e ibride, che fanno parte della limited edition â€œThe color energy FIAT X PIGNAâ€ nata dalla collaborazione tra FIAT e Pigna, azienda italiana leader nel settore cartotecnico. Lâ€™iniziativa romana, quindi, conferma lâ€™impegno del Brand per accompagnare gli italiani verso una mobilitÃ¡ elettrica ed elettrificata attraverso vetture innovative, belle e accessibili ma anche con progetti e iniziative originali che sappiano coinvolgere e informare i piÃº giovani al cambiamento in atto. Del resto, il passaggio alle auto elettriche ed elettrificate non Ã© un semplice processo di sostituzione di veicoli, ma comporta una sinergia coordinata tra attori che operano in settori diversi â€“ industriale, istituzionale e di servizi â€“ accompagnato anche da unâ€™evoluzione del modo di pensare della cultura ambientale da parte della comunitÃ¡. In occasione di Rom-E e fino alla fine di ottobre, Fiat 600 Hybrid puÃ³ essere acquistata al prezzo promozionale di 18.950 euro e un finanziamento di Stellantis Financial Services Italia e agli incentivi statali (previa disponibilitÃ¡), con un canone mensile di 250 euro, Zero Anticipo, TAN (fisso) 8,75% â€“ TAEG 11,74% e prima rata a gennaio 2025. Fino al 31 0ttobre, Topolino Ã© offerta ad un prezzo a partire da 9.890 euro, lo stesso della versione chiusa o Docevita. Inoltre, grazie anche agli incentivi statali, Ã© disponibile con una soluzione, proposta da Stellantis Financial Services, di leasing a 48 mesi con un canone mensile a partire da 29 euro, simile al prezzo di un abbonamento mensile ai trasporti pubblici. â€œEssere presenti a un evento come Rom-E Ã© importante per la strada che Fiat vuole perseguire verso una mobilitÃ¡ sempre piÃº sostenibile per le cittÃ¡. Del resto, con una lunga storia costellata di rilevanza sociale, FIAT sente forte la responsabilitÃ¡ di promuovere una guida elettrificata sempre piÃº accessibile, facile nella quotidianitÃ¡ e che faccia innamorare le nuove generazioni. Pertanto, invito tutti a scoprire sul nostro stand la nuova 600 Hybrid e a guidare tra le vie della capitale Topolino, espressione di una mobilitÃ¡ gioiosa, sostenibile e alla portata di tuttiâ€ dichiara Giuseppe Galassi, Managing Director Fiat e Abarth in Italia. foto: ufficio stampa Stellantis (ITALPRESS). tvi/com 03-Ott-24 19:06

author: Uneeb Khan
title: Explore the Top SimpliSafe Indoor Camera Reviews for Enhanced Home Security - Businessfig
text: In an era marked by technological advancements, the quest for securing our homes and businesses has led to the evolution of surveillance systems. Security cameras, a vital component of any comprehensive security strategy, come in various forms, with CCTV (Closed-Circuit Television) and wireless options being among the most popular. In this comprehensive guide, weâ€™ll delve into the debate of CCTV wireless security cameras, exploring their key features, specifications, and helping you make an informed decision about which one suits your needs best. Understanding CCTV (Closed-Circuit Television) While traditional CCTV systems have long been a mainstay in the security industry, modern solutions like the [Best SimpliSafe Indoor Camera](https://www.arsalpro.com/best-simplisafe-indoor-camera-reviews) reviews are gaining prominence. These advanced systems offer wireless connectivity, high-resolution feeds, and smart features, providing a new dimension to home security. However, the reliability of CCTV remains unparalleled, making it a steadfast choice in critical environments like banks, government facilities, and industrial complexes. Key Features of CCTV Security Cameras: - Reliability: Wired connections make CCTV systems highly reliable, ensuring uninterrupted surveillance. - Stability: Immune to wireless interference, CCTV cameras provide a stable and consistent video feed. - Customization: Easy to scale and customize, allowing for the addition of more cameras and features as needed. - Durability: Wired connections are less susceptible to environmental factors, enhancing the durability of CCTV systems. - Security: With a closed system, the risk of hacking or unauthorized access is significantly reduced. Understanding Wireless Security Cameras Wireless security cameras, on the other hand, have gained popularity for their flexibility and ease of installation. These cameras utilize Wi-Fi or other wireless technologies to transmit video signals, eliminating the need for extensive cabling. This makes them a popular choice for residential areas, small businesses, and locations where running cables may be challenging or impractical. Key Features of Wireless Security Cameras: - Flexibility: Wireless cameras are easy to install and relocate, providing flexibility in choosing surveillance locations. - Cost-Effective Installation: No need for extensive cabling reduces installation costs, making wireless systems more budget-friendly. - Remote Access: Many wireless cameras offer remote monitoring capabilities, allowing users to view footage from anywhere with an internet connection. - Scalability: Wireless systems can be easily expanded without the need for additional cabling, making them scalable to evolving security needs. - Quick Deployment: Ideal for temporary surveillance needs or events, wireless cameras can be quickly deployed and dismantled [.](https://businessfig.com/) CCTV vs. Wireless: A Comparative Analysis Now, letâ€™s delve into a side-by-side comparison of CCTV and wireless security cameras based on essential factors: |Features||CCTV Security Cameras||Wireless Security Cameras| |Reliability||Highly reliable with stable wired connections.||Dependent on the strength and stability of Wi-Fi.| |Installation||Requires cabling, potentially more complex.||Simple installation without the need for cables.| |Flexibility||Less flexible due to wired connections.||Highly flexible with easy relocation options.| |Cost||Initial installation costs may be higher.||Generally more cost-effective in installation.| |Scalability||Scalable but may require additional cabling.||Easily scalable without the need for cabling.| |Remote Access||Limited without additional network configurations.||Remote access is a standard feature.| |Durability||More durable in harsh environmental conditions.||Susceptible to environmental factors.| Choosing the Right Security Camera The choice between CCTV and wireless security cameras, including those highlighted in [Best SimpliSafe Indoor Camera ](https://www.arsalpro.com/best-simplisafe-indoor-camera-reviews)reviews, hinges on individual requirements, budget considerations, and the intended application. In scenarios where steadfast reliability is crucial, especially in high-security zones, CCTV systems remain a favored option. On the other hand, for situations that demand flexibility, rapid deployment, and cost-effectiveness, wireless security cameras, with insights from comprehensive reviews, emerge as a compelling solution. Itâ€™s worth noting that hybrid solutions combining both wired and wireless technologies are also available, providing the best of both worlds. These systems leverage the stability of CCTV where needed while incorporating the flexibility of wireless cameras in other areas. In Conclusion In the ever-evolving landscape of security technology, the choice between CCTV and wireless security cameras is not a one-size-fits-all decision. Each type has its unique set of advantages and considerations, catering to different requirements and scenarios. As you embark on the journey of fortifying your premises, carefully evaluate your priorities, weigh the pros and cons, and choose the security camera system that aligns best with your needs.

author: SIPSE.com
title: CDMX Bate RÃ©cord: Registrada la Temperatura MÃ¡xima HistÃ³rica
text: CDMX bate rÃ©cord: registrada la temperatura mÃ¡xima histÃ³rica Los termÃ³metros marcan un rÃ©cord sin precedentes en la capital del paÃ­s, generando preocupaciÃ³n entre los residentes y las autoridades locales. La Ciudad de MÃ©xico ha hecho historia este jueves al alcanzar su temperatura mÃ¡xima jamÃ¡s registrada. En el venerable Observatorio de Tacubaya , hogar de los registros climÃ¡ticos mÃ¡s antiguos de la capital, el termÃ³metro marcÃ³ impresionantes 34,3 grados centÃ­grados , superando asÃ­ la marca establecida apenas el pasado mes de abril. La ComisiÃ³n Nacional del Agua (Conagua) confirmÃ³ este hecho sin precedentes a travÃ©s de sus redes sociales, destacando que esta cifra establece un nuevo rÃ©cord tanto para el Observatorio de Tacubaya como para un 9 de mayo en la Ciudad de MÃ©xico . Â¡El calor estÃ¡ que arde en la capital! Este rÃ©cord histÃ³rico nos recuerda la importancia de estar preparados para los extremos climÃ¡ticos y nos hace reflexionar sobre los efectos del cambio climÃ¡tico en nuestras vidas. Del mismo modo se revelÃ³ el rÃ©cord para un 9 de mayoâ€, indicÃ³ la ComisiÃ³n Nacional del Agua (Conagua) en su cuenta de X. Con informaciÃ³n de Reforma.

author: Federico Furzan
title: 'Insidious 6' Release Delayed, Horror Sequel Pushed Back a Whole Year
text:
Insidious, the hit horror franchise created by genre visionaries James Wan and Leigh Whannell, was set to deliver its sixth entry in August 2025. However, we now have some bad news, as Sony Pictures Releasing has decided to push back Insidious 6 (thereâ€™s still no official title) by a whole year. The latest Insidious movie will now be released on August 21, 2026. According to Deadline, execs at Sony Pictures has now pushed the latest Insidious film to 2026 in the hopes of putting a more promising feature in its spot. Thus, they're replacing Insidious 6 with Caught Stealing, the crime thriller directed by Darren Aronofsky and based on the book of the same name by Charlie Huston. The movie stars Austin Butler, ZoÃ« Kravitz, Matt Smith, Regina King, Liev Schreiber, Bad Bunny, and Vincent D'Onofrio, among others.
Caught Stealing follows former baseball player Hank Thompson as he falls into the criminal underworld of 1990s New York City. A funny irony in this release date swap is that the adaptation has been in development since 2013, and Insidious star Patrick Wilson was initially in line for the lead role. That project got stuck in development hell and was eventually scrapped. Although Sony Pictures has decided to keep Insidious 6 on their roster (the movie will be released through one of their companies, Screen Gems), the project is still shrouded in complete mystery. It's apparently still in pre-production, and only producers have been confirmed (the usual suspects include Jason Blum, Oren Peli, and others). There's currently no writer, director, or cast for Insidious 6.
This disappointing news of Insidious 6's delay was announced the very same day that the franchise was all over the media, albeit not for one of its films. Insidious: The Further You Fear is a live immersive horror experience based on the franchise that was touring the country. After a few performances, reviews were so bad that the show was unceremoniously canceled. It's not that one should associate this kind of failure with Sony Pictures reorganizing their schedule, but it's a bit suspicious.
A Horror Franchise That Refuses to End
Sure, movies are pushed back, and immersive experiences are canceled, but that doesn't mean the Insidious franchise is nearing its demise. There's still potential here, and proof of that was the last entry released in 2023. Insidious: The Red Door is actually a pretty scary film directed by franchise star Patrick Wilson (in his feature directorial debut) that managed to tackle the original themes and continue the story of the Lambert family that had come to a halt with Insidious: Chapter 2.
Related
10 Movies to Watch If You Loved Insidious: The Red Door
The newest installment in the Insidious franchise is making headlines at the box office. Here are some films you should pair with it.
After Insidious: Chapter 2, the franchise continued with prequels that still made a lot of money at the box office and proved the value of Leigh Whannell's scripts (he has written every installment except for The Red Door). So, if you come to think about it, there's a reason why the Insidious franchise refuses to die. All the movies have made over $730 million from a combined production budget of less than $50 million. It's one of Blumhouse Productions' most important and successful IPs, and no doubt there will be much more to come after Insidious 6 hits theaters in 2026.

title: Fuerte granizada en varios barrios de BogotÃ¡ este jueves 21 de febrero
text: Colombia Fuerte granizada en varios barrios de BogotÃ¡ este jueves 21 de marzo Varias localidades de la ciudad capitalina se han visto afectadas por las fuertes lluvias y el granizo. [Por: RedacciÃ³n El PaÃ­s](/autor/redaccion-el-pais/) En la tarde de este jueves, 21 de marzo, las autoridades reportaron fuertes lluvias y hasta la caÃ­da de granizo, en varias localidades de BogotÃ¡. Este fenÃ³meno natural quedÃ³ registrado en algunas imÃ¡genes y videos tomados por ciudadanos, quienes, a su vez, los compartieron en redes sociales. En ellos se logra apreciar l [a torrencial lluvia que cae varias zonas de la ciudad](https://www.elpais.com.co/cali/cuando-llegara-a-su-fin-el-fenomeno-de-el-nino-y-comenzaran-las-lluvias-0915.html) capitalina, asÃ­ como las calles con cierto color blanco, debido a la granizada. Por su parte, el Instituto Distrital de GestiÃ³n de Riesgos y Cambio ClimÃ¡tico, Idiger, informÃ³ que se registraron lluvias intensas en las localidades de San CristÃ³bal y Santa Fe, suroriente de BogotÃ¡. Asimismo, dio a conocer que las precipitaciones han estado acompaÃ±adas de actividad elÃ©ctrica en zonas de las localidades de Antonio NariÃ±o, La Candelaria y Santa Fe. SegÃºn la entidad, los barrios que reportan precipitaciones son los siguientes: UsaquÃ©n, Suba, EngativÃ¡, FontibÃ³n, Usme, Ciudad BolÃ­var, y San CristÃ³bal. De otro lado, desde Movilidad BogotÃ¡ recomendaron conducir con precauciÃ³n: â€œRecuerde que [la lluvia puede restablecer la visibilidad](https://www.elpais.com.co/colombia/video-i-fuertes-lluvias-en-el-norte-y-centro-de-bogota-asi-fue-la-granizada-0423.html) y el piso hÃºmedo afectarÃ¡ la capacidad de frenadoâ€. â€” IDIGER (@IDIGER) [#AEstaHora]Se intensifican las lluvias sobre las localidades de Rafael Uribe Uribe, San CristÃ³bal, Antonio NariÃ±o, La Candelaria, Santa Fe, UsaquÃ©n y Suba. Se prevÃ© se extiendan al resto de la ciudad en los prÃ³ximos minutos ðŸŒ¨ï¸ [pic.twitter.com/vjHTFrdki2] [March 21, 2024] Lluvias en el EstÃ©reo Picnic Como es tradicional, cada aÃ±o, durante la realizaciÃ³n del festival EstÃ©reo Picnic, [este 2024 tambiÃ©n estarÃ¡ pasado por agua](https://www.elpais.com.co/colombia/pasados-por-agua-asi-seran-los-dias-durante-el-estereo-picnic-segun-el-reporte-climatico-2102.html). El Instituto de HidrologÃ­a, MeteorologÃ­a y Estudios Ambientales (Ideam) entregÃ³ el pronÃ³stico del clima para este jueves 21 de marzo. SegÃºn la autoridad meteorolÃ³gica, â€œse prevÃ©n algunas lluvias para la tardeâ€ que podrÃ­an estar acompaÃ±adas de â€œtormentas elÃ©ctricas y posiblemente granizo en algunas zonasâ€. La probabilidad de lluvia serÃ¡ superior al 50 % y solo despuÃ©s de las 7 de la noche terminarÃ¡ el peligro de rayos, manteniÃ©ndose los chubascos por lo menos hasta las 10 de la noche. Pero no serÃ¡ el Ãºnico dÃ­a en que se esperan lluvias. Para el viernes 22 se espera un dÃ­a nublado, con una posibilidad de precipitaciones del 5 %. El sÃ¡bado habrÃ¡ una posibilidad de precipitaciones del 50% y para el domingo esta serÃ¡ del 55 %.

title: MÃ©s pantalla, mÃ©s bateria i mÃ©s cÃ mera per menys diners: aixÃ­ Ã©s el mÃ²bil que estÃ  convencent tothom
text:
Amb la seva pantalla gran de 6,78 polzades, tres cÃ meres principals i una bateria de mÃ©s de 5.000 mAh, aquest dispositiu de Nubia sâ€™estÃ  guanyant la confianÃ§a de molts usuaris exigents. El model Z60S Pro 5G destaca pel seu rendiment equilibrat, una interfÃ­cie fluÃ¯da i prestacions dignes de la gamma alta, perÃ² amb un preu molt mÃ©s competitiu. Ara mateix el pots aconseguir per 375,99 â‚¬, amb una rebaixa gens habitual de 462 â‚¬ sobre el preu original.
Un 55% de descompte per un dels mÃ²bils mÃ©s complets del moment
El Nubia Z60S Pro 5G Ã©s un dels telÃ¨fons intelÂ·ligents mÃ©s complets dins la seva franja de preu. El seu processador Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 â€”el mateix que equipen alguns models de gamma altaâ€” garanteix un rendiment potent, amb una gestiÃ³ molt eficient dels recursos i una fluÃ¯desa impecable tant en jocs com en aplicacions exigents.
La pantalla AMOLED de 6,78 polzades i 120 Hz ofereix una experiÃ¨ncia visual molt agradable, ideal per veure sÃ¨ries, jugar o llegir contingut amb una gran qualitat dâ€™imatge. A mÃ©s, ve equipat amb el sistema MyOS 14, una interfÃ­cie prÃ²pia de Nubia basada en Android, que destaca per la seva estabilitat i simplicitat.
Amb un disseny prim i modern, el Z60S Pro tambÃ© incorpora NFC per fer pagaments sense contacte, reconeixement facial i sensor dâ€™empremta integrat sota la pantalla. Ã‰s un dispositiu pensat per a usuaris que volen tot en un mÃ²bil: velocitat, autonomia, qualitat de pantalla i bones cÃ meres, perÃ² sense haver de pagar un preu alt.
Ideal per a qui busca rendiment, cÃ mera i autonomia en un sol dispositiu
Aquest model Ã©s perfecte per a persones que fan servir intensament el mÃ²bil durant el dia: feina, continguts audiovisuals, fotografia i xarxes socials. La bateria de 5.100 mAh supera la jornada completa sense problemes, fins i tot amb un Ãºs intens, i es pot carregar de forma rÃ pida.
Pel que fa a les cÃ meres, incorpora un sistema triple amb sensors de 50 + 50 + 8 megapÃ­xels, que ofereixen una bona qualitat tant en fotografies de dia com de nit. Fa bones captures amb poca llum, mantÃ© els colors naturals i enfoca amb precisiÃ³. No Ã©s un mÃ²bil pensat per substituir una cÃ mera professional, perÃ² sÃ­ que Ã©s mÃ©s que suficient per a lâ€™Ãºs quotidiÃ , viatges i contingut per a xarxes.
TambÃ© val la pena destacar el seu sistema operatiu, amb una gestiÃ³ neta i fluida, i sense aplicacions innecessÃ ries que sovint trobem en altres marques. AixÃ² fa que lâ€™experiÃ¨ncia dâ€™Ãºs sigui molt mÃ©s Ã gil, sense alentiments ni notificacions intrusives.
Un preu difÃ­cil de repetir per un dispositiu amb caracterÃ­stiques de gamma alta
La rebaixa actual situa aquest Nubia Z60S Pro 5G en una posiciÃ³ molt atractiva dins el mercat. Ara mateix el pots tenir per 375,99 â‚¬, quan el seu preu original era de 838 â‚¬. Ã‰s una diferÃ¨ncia de 462 â‚¬, que el converteix en una opciÃ³ realment competitiva si busques un mÃ²bil nou amb prestacions altes.
No Ã©s habitual trobar un telÃ¨fon amb un processador com el Snapdragon 8 Gen 2, pantalla AMOLED de 120 Hz, 5G, triple cÃ mera i bateria de mÃ©s de 5.000 mAh per menys de 400 â‚¬. Per aixÃ², molts usuaris lâ€™estan considerant una alternativa intelÂ·ligent a marques mÃ©s conegudes perÃ² molt mÃ©s cares.
Sigui per renovar un mÃ²bil antic, per tenir un segon terminal amb garanties o per fer un regal ben trobat, aquest dispositiu pot ser una opciÃ³ molt encertada. Sobretot ara, amb aquesta oferta tan destacada.
Aquest article pot incloure enllaÃ§os dâ€™afiliaciÃ³. Si compres a travÃ©s dâ€™ells, a ElNacional.cat podrÃ­em rebre una petita comissiÃ³. AixÃ² no afecta el preu que pagues ni condiciona la nostra opiniÃ³.
